name: Sakura Dimensions
description:
Experience interdimensional love in this unique visual novel! This visual novel comes with three different play styles!

    • Make choices!
    • Write poems!
    • Turn-based RPG styled battles!

Two girls from another dimension have appeared in your room! And it's raining sakura petals...? What is going on?

Find out more about the girls as you try to find a way back to their own dimensions. Or... would you like them to stay with you instead?

Win your girls' heart by either talking, writing or battling into their heart!
